name: Music_126.wav
keywords: ['pop song', 'boy band', 'male voice', 'bass', 'synth', 'programmed percussion', 'shaker', 'slow tempo', 'romantic song']
caption: This pop song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by programmed percussion playing a simple beat. The snare is struck on alternate counts. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. A synth plays chords on the first count of every bar. A shaker plays a pattern in the background. The mood of this song is romantic. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
